about_the_game:
This game transports players into a mysterious dark world, where they play as a red strawberry bear.

Using the AD keys to control its movement and the space bar to attack, the red strawberry bear must navigate forward through the darkness. The path ahead is littered with various obstacles and traps, requiring players to remain vigilant and skillfully avoid these hazards to ensure the bear's safety. Along the way, there are also extra rewards such as stars and fruits that can be collected to increase the score. The game's visuals are uniquely designed with stark color contrasts, making the red strawberry bear stand out vividly against the dark background. The background music is soft and mysterious, complemented by appropriate sound effects, like the crisp sound of collecting rewards, creating an engaging and fun adventure atmosphere for players of all ages. This game not only tests players' reflexes but also provides hours of enjoyment.

name: Decline

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9600K / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 980 / AMD Radeon RX 590 / Intel Arc A750
